item.description:
Our good buddies over at Boston Music Spotlight (www.bostonmusicspotlight.com) are hosting their first ever Battle of the Bands at Oliver's in Fenway this THURSDAY Night at 7:30pm. A $10 cover gets you access to five local favorites who will battle it out in thirty minute sets for the chance to win some pretty cool stuff.

The Bands:

The Candace Brooks Band: myspace.com/thecandacebrooksband
Cemetery Superfly: myspace.com/cemeterysuperflyband
Hello Mahalo: myspace.com/hellomahalo
Six Day Slide: myspace.com/sixdayslide
Tunnlvision: myspace.com/tunnlvision

The prizes include:

Studio Time courtesy of JamSpot
250 CDs courtesy of CDWorks
Professional photos courtesy of Liz Linder Photography, and
A customized Legal & Strategy Band Start Up Package, courtesy of those fun/cool guys at Revolve!

Hope to see all of you there and make sure you tell every last one of your friends to come with you!
item.name: Boston Music Spotlight's Battle of the Bands!
